cast.overview: In the year 2044, time travel has not yet been invented but in 30 years it will have been. When the mob wants to get rid of someone, they will send their target into the past where a looper, a hired gun, like Joe is waiting to mop up. Joe is getting rich and life is good until the day the mob decides to close the loop, sending back Joe's future self for assassination.
cast.title: Looper

cast.original_title: Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery
cast.overview: World-famous detective Benoit Blanc heads to Greece to peel back the layers of a mystery surrounding a tech billionaire and his eclectic crew of friends.
cast.title: Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery

cast.overview: When renowned crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found dead at his estate just after his 85th birthday, the inquisitive and debonair Detective Benoit Blanc is mysteriously enlisted to investigate. From Harlan's dysfunctional family to his devoted staff, Blanc sifts through a web of red herrings and self-serving lies to uncover the truth behind Harlan's untimely death.
cast.title: Knives Out

details.biography:
Noah Segan is an American actor. He is best known for his work in the films of Rian Johnson (Looper, Brick, Knives Out) and his appearance in Deadgirl.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Noah Segan, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Noah Segan
details.place_of_birth: Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
